overview: Over the course of his career, Spike has been in seventeen movies with Channel 1 Releasing. The Best of Spike highlights the hottest moments this big-dicked stud ever experienced on camera with sweltering threesomes, orgies and a self-voyeuristic solo. Featuring scenes from Spiked, Tighty Whities, and Billy Herrington's Body Shop with Billy Herrington, Dean Phoenix and Emilio Sands.
title: The Best Of Spike
